column2: BRIEF-American Water Works - Co May Need To Consider Alternative Sources of Funding For Operations April 8 (Reuters) - American Water Works Company Inc : * AMERICAN WATER WORKS - ON APRIL 1, TERMINATION DATE OF CREDIT AGREEMENT WITH RESPECT TO REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY WAS EXTENDED TO MARCH 21, 2025 * AMERICAN WATER WORKS COMPANY, UNDER RISK FACTORS, SAYS CO MAY NEED TO CONSIDER ALTERNATIVE SOURCES OF FUNDING FOR ITS OPERATIONS - SEC FILING * AMERICAN WATER WORKS COMPANY - BELIEVE THAT EXISTING SOURCES OF LIQUIDITY WILL BE SUFFICIENT TO MEET CASH REQUIREMENTS FOR FORESEEABLE FUTURE * AMERICAN WATER WORKS - IN Q1 2020 ENTERED INTO FINANCIAL DERIVATIVE INSTRUMENTS TO MANAGE EXPOSURE TO INTEREST RATE RISK Source text for Eikon: [ID:bit.ly/2RgEbOf] Further company coverage:
